meanings.definition: performers or acts that appear lower on a bill or program
meanings.sent1: The backliners at the concert played before the main band.
meanings.sent2: The backliners were excited to showcase their talent to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The backliners decided to start a band of their own and headline their show.
meanings.sent4: The backliners shone brightly on stage, stealing the spotlight from the headliner.
meanings.sent5: The backliners' performance was unforgettable, leaving the crowd wanting more.

meanings.definition: individuals who provide support or assistance from behind the scenes
meanings.sent1: During the play, the backliners helped with props and costumes.
meanings.sent2: The backliners worked tirelessly to ensure the show ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The backliners secretly added funny props to the set, surprising the actors.
meanings.sent4: The backliners were the unsung heroes of the production, making everything possible.
meanings.sent5: The backliners' dedication and hard work were evident in the flawless performance.
